name: Old 412/421 Forever
short_description:
This my Site full of Stuff for my favourite and in my opinion the best Puppy Linuxes Ever!

This site is inspired by the work of Tuxtoo and the 412Collection.

Remembering also Barry K for creating Puppy Linux in the first place and all those others who have worked on it.
Many of the programs on this site work with an unmodified 412/421 and Slaxerpup install.

for more info on .pets check this wiki for Murga Forum thread link: https://sourceforge.net/p/old412forever/wiki/Links%20to%20Murga%20forums%20for%20.pets/

Lots of great original ISO's to download from Puppy History here:     https://sourceforge.net/projects/old412forever/files/

So enjoy!  This celebration of these superb unleashed builds.

EMERGENCY UPDATE FOR BASH BELOW

http://sourceforge.net/projects/anitaos/files/Anitaos/bash-3.0.20-i486.pet
